abstract: Bank of America asked a federal court to prevent the Dutch bank ABN Amro from selling its Chicago subsidiary, LaSalle Bank, to rival bidders.
snippet: Bank of America asked a federal court to prevent the Dutch bank ABN Amro from selling its Chicago subsidiary, LaSalle Bank, to rival bidders.
lead_paragraph: Bank of America asked a federal court yesterday to prevent the Dutch bank ABN Amro from selling its Chicago subsidiary, LaSalle Bank, to rival bidders after its $21 billion acquisition of LaSalle was halted by a Dutch court.

headline.main: Bank of America Files Suit Over Deal to Buy LaSalle
headline.print_headline: Bank of America Files Suit Over Deal to Buy LaSalle
